title: Krzywe Karty
description: Multiplayer turn-based strategic card game where each card has several complex abilities.
Player's goal is to either conquer opponent's base or eliminate all of their cards.
The game is based on a board game developed by my friend.
focus_points: Uses Gameplay Framework to create a turn-based game as well as Gameplay Ability System for character abilities.
Implemented complex attack system using component-based approach, that allows character to bind to different stages & scenarios of the attack.
Created elegant solution for gameboard management and querying with the use of InstancedStructs and Gameplay Tags.

title: Andromeda
short_description: A prototype of an Action-Adventure RPG game
description: The game me & my friends developed during our last semester at university of Wroclaw.
Our goal was to make a prototype of an Action-Adventure RPG for the narrative we came up with (watch the video).
We had a lot of fun working on it, and we learned a lot about game development and project management.
Me personally, were responsible for the coordination of the project, as well as the programming most important parts of the game.
focus_points: Complex and dynamic inventory & equipment system with drag & drop functionality.
Advanced attack system with combo attacks and special abilities also depending on the weapon type.
Simple but effective AI system with different types of enemies.

title: Coco Jumpo
description: A game developed during Hackathon 2020 with my friends. We had 48 hours to create this game.
We were inspired by the game of our childhood - IcyTower.
I was responsible for developing the levels and programming procedural generation of the platforms.
focus_points: Procedural generation of the platforms, each fitting like a puzzle piece.
Dynamic camera system that follows the player and speeds up depending on the traveled distance.
Different obstacles and power-ups that diversify the gameplay.

title: Procedural terrain generator
short_description: A tool for procedural terrain generation in Unreal Engine
description: Tool for procedural terrain generation in UE5 developed as a part of my engineer degree.
Uses for Unreal's built-in Landscape actor and allows to specify a list of modifiers that modify its heightmap.
Comes with two ready modifiers: Perlin Noise and Radial FadeOut.
I used them both to create an island visible on the screenshot.
focus_points: Works on Unreal's built-it Landscape actor by attaching a component with a list of modifiers.
Built-in modifiers like Perlin Noise and Radial FadeOut, but system is extensible and allows to create custom modifiers.
